Class IdentityTableMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapReduceBase
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapred.IdentityTableMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, TableMap<ImmutableBytesWritable,Result>, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobConfigurable, org.apache.hadoop.mapred.Mapper<ImmutableBytesWritable,Result,ImmutableBytesWritable,Result>

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class IdentityTableMap
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapred.MapReduceBase
implements TableMap<ImmutableBytesWritable,Result>
    Pass the given key and record as-is to reduce
